Student_Application_Data_W25.description: This subelement represents one line in the Program of Study grid, with a Program of Study, an order, and a Program Focus if applicable.

validation.validation: Program Focus is required for [POS]
The Program Focus must be Approved.
The Program Focus must have a Program of Study Type with Category of 'Program Focus'.
The Program Focus provided is not configured for the Program of Study.
You can’t select this campus for the selected program of study on this line. Select a different campus location for the selected program of study and educational interest line.
The Academic Period Provided must be configured with the Academic Unit and Level.
Each Program of Study must be offered by an Academic Unit and Level which is configured to Admit, or that rolls up to a superior Academic Unit and Level which admits.
The Program Focus must be valid for the Academic Period or Anticipated Start Date.
The Program of Study must be valid for the Academic Period or Anticipated Start Date.
All Programs of Study must have an Academic Unit that uses the Academic Period Type given.

This flag controls whether or not existing non-primary phone data will be replaced. A value of true means only the referenced phone will be updated, or created if it does not exist or no reference was provided. This behavior is used if the flag is set to true for ANY email address in the request.

Pass this ISO code to distinguish between multiple countries sharing the same Country Phone Code. Full phone number.

Set this flag to true in order to delete the referenced communication method. If this flag is set, the Reference ID field becomes required, and all other communication method fields that would otherwise be required will be optional and meaningless.

This flag controls whether or not existing non-primary phone data will be replaced. A value of true means only the referenced phone will be updated, or created if it does not exist or no reference was provided. This behavior is used if the flag is set to true for ANY email address in the request.

Country ISO code. If the Country ISO code is specified, then this ISO code will be used to determine the Country Phone Code for (eliminate space between f and o) the phone. Pass this ISO code to distinguish between multiple countries sharing the same Country Phone Code. (For example, 1 is the Country Phone Code that is shared by USA, Canada, Dominican Republic, Bermuda, Jamaica, and Puerto Rico.)
International phone code number.
Full phone number.
